short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement - Office Seating
full_summary:
=================
### Office Seating Procurement Notice

#### Notice Title

AVIS DE PROJET DE MARCHÉ (APM) / NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)

#### Tender Reference Number

2372

#### Solicitation Number

01B68-23-2372

#### Contracting Authority

Agriculture & Agroalimentaire Canada (AAFC)

#### Tendering Details

*   ***Procurement category***: Goods
*   ***Trade agreements***: None
*   ***Limited tendering reason***: None
*   ***Procurement method***: Competitive - Open bidding
*   ***Trade agreements***: None

### Tender Description

The purpose of this tender is to purchase office seating for Agriculture & Agroalimentaire Canada.

*   ***Estimated dollar value***: Between $45,000 and $50,000 CAD, including taxes
*   ***Contract duration***: Services must be completed by March 29, 2024
*   ***Observation point***: This requirement is a set-aside under the federal government's procurement strategy for Indigenous Business.
*   ***Tendering procedure***: Selective tendering
*   ***Delivery location***: Canada
*   ***Estimated level of effort***: Indicate in the Statement of Work (SOW)

### Requirement Details

*   ***Tender status***: Expiré / Expiré
*   ***Tender closing date***: October 6, 2023, at 12:00 PM (HST)
*   ***Pre-qualified suppliers***: Only pre-qualified suppliers under the # E60PQ-120001/PQ arrangement in place

### Contact Information

*   ***Contracting Authority***: Julie Mercier
*   ***E-mail***: <julie.mercier@agr.gc.ca>
*   ***Phone***: 5 5 5 5 5 5

### RFP Documents

*   *Download the RFP documents here:* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files…;https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/fi…;https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/fi…

### Description of Work

*   The successful supplier shall provide office seating for the specified locations.

### Estimated Requirement Dollar Value

The estimated total price for this requirement, including applicable taxes, is between $45,000 CAD and $50,
